column1: Included processes: Heavy metals withdrawn from agricultural soil by harvest of agricultural biomass. The withdrawal is modelled as a negative emission to agricultural soil.Remark: Refers to 1 kg of dry matter of argicultural biomass harvested. At the end of the life cycle of the product
column2: the heavy metals will be released to the respective environmental compartment
column3: which should be taken into account.
